text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a953b5cf4f291875b805262eebd361e502de8c92|patch 8.2.1652: cannot translate lines in the options window>
patch 8.2.1652: cannot translate lines in the options window

Problem:    Cannot translate lines in the options window.
Solution:   Use the AddOption() function to split descriptions where indicated
            by a line break. (issue #6800)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1652: cannot translate lines in the options window · vim/vim@a953b5c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1652: cannot translate lines in the options window · vim/vim@a953b5c
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot translate lines in the options window. Solution: Use the AddOption() function to split descriptions where indicated by a line break. (issue #6800)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c1ec0422e43720d2e96627605532ee9806c0789f|patch 8.2.1650: Vim9: result of && and || expression is not bool in s…>
patch 8.2.1650: Vim9: result of && and || expression is not bool in script

Problem:    Vim9: result of && and || expression cannot be assigned to a bool
            at the script level.
Solution:   Add the VAR_BOOL_OK flag.  Convert to bool when needed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1650: Vim9: result of && and || expression is not bool in s… · vim/vim@c1ec042
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1650: Vim9: result of && and || expression is not bool in s… · vim/vim@c1ec042
attachments.text: …cript Problem: Vim9: result of && and || expression cannot be assigned to a bool at the script level. Solution: Add the VAR_BOOL_OK flag. Convert to bool when needed.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3e4cc9671c5551b73f0176cab40e676ed72a1716|patch 8.2.1649: GTK3: using old file chooser>
patch 8.2.1649: GTK3: using old file chooser

Problem:    GTK3: using old file chooser.
Solution:   Use native file chooser on GTK 3.20 and above. (Yogeshwar
            Velingker, closes #6909)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1649: GTK3: using old file chooser · vim/vim@3e4cc96
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1649: GTK3: using old file chooser · vim/vim@3e4cc96
attachments.text: Problem: GTK3: using old file chooser. Solution: Use native file chooser on GTK 3.20 and above. (Yogeshwar Velingker, closes #6909)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a62372be1f73b69f9d4c9413ec816d773a16a0f5|patch 8.2.1648: Amiga: no common build file for Amiga (-like) systems>
patch 8.2.1648: Amiga: no common build file for Amiga (-like) systems

Problem:    Amiga: no common build file for Amiga (-like) systems.
Solution:   Turn Make_morph.mak into Make_ami.mak. (Ola Söder, closes #6805)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1648: Amiga: no common build file for Amiga (-like) systems · vim/vim@a62372b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1648: Amiga: no common build file for Amiga (-like) systems · vim/vim@a62372b
attachments.text: Problem: Amiga: no common build file for Amiga (-like) systems. Solution: Turn Make_morph.mak into Make_ami.mak. (Ola Söder, closes #6805)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4ed124cc6c0c55385c3b2fed9f9357baf42edbcc|patch 8.2.1647: Vim9: result of expression with && and || is not a bool>
patch 8.2.1647: Vim9: result of expression with && and || is not a bool

Problem:    Vim9: result of expression with && and || cannot be assigned to a
            bool variable.
Solution:   Add the TTFLAG_BOOL_OK flag and convert the value if needed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1647: Vim9: result of expression with && and || is not a bool · vim/vim@4ed124c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1647: Vim9: result of expression with && and || is not a bool · vim/vim@4ed124c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: result of expression with && and || cannot be assigned to a bool variable. Solution: Add the TTFLAG_BOOL_OK flag and convert the value if needed.

Solution:   Remove the #include. (Ola Söder, closes #6908)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/81a4cf469a0f5c1603ac3130af9f011053854180|patch 8.2.1645: GTK3: icons become broken images when resized>
patch 8.2.1645: GTK3: icons become broken images when resized

Problem:    GTK3: icons become broken images when resized.
Solution:   Use gtk_image_new_from_icon_name(). (closes #6916)
            Fix compiler warnings.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1645: GTK3: icons become broken images when resized · vim/vim@81a4cf4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1645: GTK3: icons become broken images when resized · vim/vim@81a4cf4
attachments.text: Problem: GTK3: icons become broken images when resized. Solution: Use gtk_image_new_from_icon_name(). (closes #6916) Fix compiler warnings.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ba7c0d7b4ce03336b4aebe1959c1a8342fa6dbd4|patch 8.2.1644: Vim9: cannot assign 1 and 0 to bool at script level>
patch 8.2.1644: Vim9: cannot assign 1 and 0 to bool at script level

Problem:    Vim9: cannot assign 1 and 0 to bool at script level.
Solution:   Add the TTFLAG_BOOL_OK flag to the type. Fix name of test
            function.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1644: Vim9: cannot assign 1 and 0 to bool at script level · vim/vim@ba7c0d7
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1644: Vim9: cannot assign 1 and 0 to bool at script level · vim/vim@ba7c0d7
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot assign 1 and 0 to bool at script level. Solution: Add the TTFLAG_BOOL_OK flag to the type. Fix name of test function.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/96f8f499ce51ea791d9b044c266f84380fa54848|patch 8.2.1643: Vim9: :defcompile compiles dead functions>
patch 8.2.1643: Vim9: :defcompile compiles dead functions

Problem:    Vim9: :defcompile compiles dead functions.
Solution:   Skip over dead functions.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1643: Vim9: :defcompile compiles dead functions · vim/vim@96f8f49
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1643: Vim9: :defcompile compiles dead functions · vim/vim@96f8f49
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: :defcompile compiles dead functions. Solution: Skip over dead functions.
